casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO, CO., Appellant/Petitioner(s),
v.
Mary LIMA, as Personal Representative, Appellee/Respondent(s). CASE NO.: 2D17-4620 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. June 08, 2018

BY ORDER OF THE COURT:

Appellee-cross appellant's notice of voluntary dismissal filed June 1, 2018, is granted, and the cross-appeal is dismissed. The appeal remains pending.
